title: Explicit time zone should not be returned where time is returned
description:
With respect to bug19992 fixed in 5.0-20121106, the explicit time zone should not be returned. But we are seeing explicit time Zone in 5.0-4.4 windows build in following xquery mentioned below.

Machine name:rh5-intel64-6
Path to 5.0-4.4 build: /tmp/6.0-2.2/MarkLogic-6.0-2.2-20130110-amd64.msi

Xquery:

       xquery version "1.0-ml";
        import module namespace admin = "http://marklogic.com/xdmp/admin" at "/MarkLogic/admin.xqy";
        let $config := admin:get-configuration()
        let $groupid := admin:group-get-id($config, "Default")
        return admin:appserver-get-request-blackouts($config,admin:appserver-get-id($config, $groupid, "QAxdbcServer"))

Actual Result:
<request-blackout xmlns="http://marklogic.com/xdmp/group" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <blackout-type>once</blackout-type>
  <users/>
  <roles/>
  <days/>
  <period>
    <start-date>2008-05-08</start-date>
    <start-time>15:24:00-08:00</start-time>
    <duration>PT2M</duration>
  </period>
</request-blackout>


Expected Result:
<request-blackout xmlns="http://marklogic.com/xdmp/group" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <blackout-type>once</blackout-type>
  <users/>
  <roles/>
  <days/>
  <period>
    <start-date>2008-05-08</start-date>
    <start-time>15:24:00</start-time>
    <duration>PT2M</duration>
  </period>
</request-blackout>
